column4: okay everyone... seeing as the ops aren't doing shit... just put him on ignore and he will leave
don't encourage the trolls
and WHERE ARE THE FUCKING OPS
i mean i have respect for the ops and the CoC, and i also like the allowance of off topic conversation, but sometimes we need ops
#freebsd pulls it off nicely
number one reason for divorce... marriage
#gentoo doesn't really allow that much off topic stuff... #freebsd is pretty free range until people need help
brb making sandwiches
I talk off topic in there all the time... some people say come on guys, that's off topic, but i've never been booted
i've never been kicked, but i usually see the conversation get stopped before it comes to kicking
why not gentoo for the server?
because it's only got 633mghz and 32 ram (gonna up it for 256megs soon)
and i don't want my server offline for 3 days
GRP
precompiled binaries
on a handy CD
emerge --usepkg
wouldn't help with that first sync and some of the other stuff
webrsync
GRP installs are designed to get a complete system installed without a network connection
it's not happening heh... ima bsd it soon though... which i like over gentoo
well i can't argue against bsd ;-)
